description: Source code for utility functions related to device validation, serialization, error handling, and timestamp generation in a network device management system.

methods.name: validate_device_create
methods.description: Validates payload for creating a network device, checking for required fields and valid IP address.

methods.name: validate_device_update
methods.description: Validates payload for updating a network device, ensuring IP, type, and location are valid and that name is not updated.

methods.name: serialize_device
methods.description: Converts a MongoDB device document into an API response format by removing internal fields.

methods.name: error_response
methods.description: Generates a standardized JSON error response with status, error code, message, and optional extra data.

methods.name: _is_valid_ip
methods.description: Checks if a string is a valid IPv4 or IPv6 address.

methods.name: current_timestamp_iso
methods.description: Returns the current UTC timestamp in ISO 8601 format with a 'Z' suffix.
